name: Party in my Dorm
description:
It's a new era for Party in my Dorm!

Party in My Dorm: I Love College is the best college game around! It's all about meeting people, sending gifts and partying with hot friends! Every week we have new episodes of content with fresh stories, great fashion and new gifts.

Hot campus stories about a cast of colorful characters and their adventures at college.
Collect rare avatars, items and gifts!
Find romance, go on dates with cute co-eds!
Join clubs and chat with cool people just like you!
Party! Party! Party!
Enjoy the campus life and party with your fraternity or sorority!

Are You Ready for College?
